text.div:
Id: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.IPV-only
Url: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Version: 0.2.0
Title: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Status: draft
Date: 2025-07-17 20:56:25+0000
Publisher: WHO
Description:

Determine required vaccinations
Knowledge Capability: computable
Related Artifacts:

References

  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization â€“ summary tables (March 2023) (1)
Libraries:
DTs.Polio
Actions:
Client is not due for IPV vaccination: Client is not due for IPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" A primary 3-dose series of IPV administered beginning at 6 or 8 weeks of age, with a minimum 4-week interval between doses, is recommended.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for IPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Shold not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first IPV dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for IPV vaccination: Client is due for IPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for IPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for IPV vaccination: Client is not due for IPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for IPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for IPV vaccination: Client is due for IPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for IPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for IPV vaccination: Client is not due for IPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for IPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the third dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for IPV vaccination: Client is due for IPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for IPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third IPV dose as the latest poliovirus dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Polio immunization schedule is complete: Polio immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines") If the primary series begins at 6 weeks, a booster dose should be given 6 months or more after the third dose.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Polio immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Polio immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 6 weeks when the primary series was started. Three poliovirus primary series doses were administered.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Primary series is complete. Client is not due for IPV booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for IPV booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines")
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is not due for IPV booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with IPV booster dose as the latest poliovirus dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the booster dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Primary series is complete. Client is due for IPV booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is due for IPV booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines")
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is due for IPV booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with IPV booster dose as three poliovirus primary series doses were administered, client's age was 6 weeks when the primary series was started and the latest poliovirus dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Polio immunization schedule is complete: Polio immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Polio immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Polio immunization schedule is complete. Three poliovirus primary series doses and a booster dose were administered.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

relatedArtifact.citation: WHO recommendations for routine immunization â€“ summary tables (March 2023) (1)

action.title: Client is not due for IPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for IPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

A primary 3-dose series of IPV administered beginning at 6 or 8 weeks of age, with a minimum 4-week interval between doses, is recommended.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Shold not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first IPV dose.

action.title: Client is due for IPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for IPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client is within appropriate age range. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Client is not due for IPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for IPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.

action.title: Client is due for IPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for IPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago.
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Client is not due for IPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for IPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with third IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the third dose.

action.title: Client is due for IPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for IPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with third IPV dose as the latest poliovirus dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Polio immunization schedule is complete
action.description:
Polio immunization schedule is complete
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines")

If the primary series begins at 6 weeks, a booster dose should be given 6 months or more after the third dose.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression: Polio immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 6 weeks when the primary series was started. Three poliovirus primary series doses were administered.

action.title: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for IPV booster dose
action.description:
Primary series is complete. Client is not due for IPV booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines")

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with IPV booster dose as the latest poliovirus dose was administered less than 6 months ago.
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the booster dose.

action.title: Primary series is complete. Client is due for IPV booster dose
action.description:
Primary series is complete. Client is due for IPV booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines")

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with IPV booster dose as three poliovirus primary series doses were administered, client's age was 6 weeks when the primary series was started and the latest poliovirus dose was administered more than 6 months ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Polio immunization schedule is complete
action.description:
Polio immunization schedule is complete
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression: Polio immunization schedule is complete. Three poliovirus primary series doses and a booster dose were administered.
